Control Name: Remediates Identified Vulnerabilities—Identified vulnerabilities are remediated through the development and execution of remediation activities.

control_attributes.Control: Remediates Identified Vulnerabilities—Identified vulnerabilities are remediated through the development and execution of remediation activities.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
